granteeId.description: Organisation id of the share grantee

signupType.description: With which signup method the user has been created

emailVerified.description: User email got verified with a link

locale.description: Will be removed, use locale in contents instead

timeZone.description: Will be removed, use timeZone in contents instead

renewInterval.description: Cooldown before alert is armed again automatically, in second

type.description: Can be use to differentiate notification with the same source

message.description: Message key (if key begins with 'translations.' , translations will be in data object)

label.description: Label key (if key begins with 'translations.' , translations will be in data object)

type.description: Type of the link (example: error, warning, ...)

label.description: Label key (if key begins with 'translations.' , translations will be in data object)

type.description: Type of the action (example: error, warning, ...)

operationId.description: Operation id binded to the action

parameters.description: JSON payload of the action parameters

label.description: Label key (if key begins with 'translations.' , translations will be in data object)

href.description: Can be a pointer to the element to download, or data itself (blob: , data: , filesystem: )

downloadType.description: Specifies the media type in the form of a MIME type for the linked URL. It is purely advisory, with no built-in functionality.

nextCursor.description: Opaque cursor you can reuse to get older items.

sinceCursor.description: Opaque cursor you can reuse to get fresher items.

PasswordTokenRequestBody.description: Resource owner password credentials grant, see https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749#section-4.3

CodeRequestTokenRequestBody.description: SMS Code request grant type, see https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749#section-6 .

truncatedSecret.description: The API secret of the application truncated.

secret.description: The API secret of the application (provided only at its creation).

authorId.description: Sencrop member team, author of the quote

currency.description: Required by Chargebee for one time charges

operationId.description: Used to gather multiple quote together

isPromotingConversion.description: Tag the quote as a quote to convert a promoting farmer

utm_source.description: Identifies which site sent the traffic

utm_medium.description: Identifies what type of link was used

signupType.description: With which signup method the user has been created

emailVerified.description: User email got verified with a link

locale.description: Will be removed, use locale in contents instead

timeZone.description: Will be removed, use timeZone in contents instead

mustBeInTrial.description: Not used anymore, will be removed in next version

date.description: The date of the cron execution
date.name: date

withCalibration.description: Wether the calibration of rain falls must be taken in count
withCalibration.name: withCalibration

minimumFiability.description: The minimum fiability of measures to be used
minimumFiability.name: minimumFiability

ranges.description: The ranges to get the data from
ranges.name: ranges

beforeDate.description: The date before which the data starts being retrieved
beforeDate.name: beforeDate

includeHistory.description: If must include device replacements or not
includeHistory.name: includeHistory

limit.name: limit
limit.description: The number of items to retrieve

patched.description: Patched data are augmented data with internal algorithms. Setting patched to false, will return raw data from device only.
patched.name: patched

radius.description: The radius of the area in meters.
radius.name: radius

days.description: The number of days to retrieve
days.name: days

interval.description: The interval of data (Accepted value : 31 days for 1h interval, 1 year for 1d interval, 5y for 1w interval)
interval.name: interval

consumptionDate.description: The date of the message consumption
consumptionDate.name: date

networkMemberId.description: The organisation id of the network member
networkMemberId.name: networkMemberId

maybeBearerAuth.description: Optional bearer authentication with a user API token

bearerAuth.description: Bearer authentication with a user API token

onceAuth.description: Bearer like authentication but doable only once (prefix is Once instead of Bearer
onceAuth.name: authorization

accessTokenAuth.description: Alternative to Bearer authentication through query parameters.
accessTokenAuth.name: access_token

fakeAuth.description: A fake authentication for development purpose.
fakeAuth.name: Authorization

tags.name: buckets
tags.description: Endpoints related to buckets (management of device remplacement).

tags.name: data
tags.description: Endpoints allowing to access to devices's data.

tags.name: graphql
tags.description: Endpoints allowing to execute GraphQL queries.

tags.name: invitations
tags.description: Endpoints related to invitations (invite users with extra side effects).

tags.name: modules
tags.description: Endpoint related to the Sencrop's modules.

tags.name: monitoring
tags.description: Endpoints related to monitoring of factory/devices activities.

tags.name: oauth2
tags.description: Endpoints relative to the [OAuth2](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749) implementation at Sencrop (still a work in progress).

tags.name: orders
tags.description: Endpoints related to manual and chargebee orders.

tags.name: partnerAccess
tags.description: Endpoints partners can access and shown in dev.sencrop.com.

tags.name: preferences
tags.description: Endpoints related to preferences of the application.

tags.name: quotes
tags.description: Endpoints related to quote and quotator.

tags.name: search
tags.description: Endpoints allowing to discover entities through the API.

tags.name: shares
tags.description: Endpoints related to organisations shared devices.

tags.name: system
tags.description: System endpoints, to be use by Sencrop's teams only.
